summary: Four runaway crooks take shelter in a bungalow which is owned by a blind couple.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Arshad Warsi|Sharman Joshi|Tusshar Kapoor|Rimi Sen|Paresh Rawal|Sushmita Mukherjee|Vrajesh Hirjee|Mukesh Tiwari|Sanjay Mishra|Siddarth Jadhav|Manoj Joshi|Farid Amiri|Ashish R. Mohan|Anupam Shyam|Raminder Singh Suri|Rajiv Varma
title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
